name: Alhazen
what_did:
Alhazen studied light, vision, and how the eyes work.
He showed that we see because light enters our eyes, not because eyes send out rays.
He did real experiments to test his ideas, like modern scientists do.
why_matters:
Alhazen helped create the science method we use today.
He made big steps in understanding optics and vision.
His work was a bridge between ancient and modern science.

questions.q: How did Alhazen test his ideas?
What did he discover about eyes?

fun_fact: Alhazen once pretended to be crazy to avoid working for a ruler he disagreed with!
